name: Planet Earth Is Blue
description:
The astronaut is lost in space, helpless. Bring him back to Earth.

I went for something kind of contemplative, chill and calming, I hope it works out !

Controls (explained in game) : Left click to spawn, hold click and drag to adjust the scale, click on a planet to destroy it (when the astronaut isn't orbiting it).

The game is intended to be played in 16:9, I have no idea how well it works in other aspect ratio. If the web version has any issue, you may want to try the desktop version for windows available below.
